body: Just finished reading the innitial volumes of this a few months ago and fell in love immediately. Really hope they decide to translate/bring over the rest of this guy's works...unbeatable milf!
YES!!!! I'm so happy this is back  I hope there will be a part 3. I was a big fan of The original manga. And for the original artist to return and do hentai spin-off is a dream come true.
I expect an eroanime adaptation of this soon
Love this shit. Supermom's gone crazy from getting blueballed? Better double team her with my girlfriend.
